sourcesContent:
<template>
  <skill-bar
    @update-page="getNewPage"
  ></skill-bar>
  <main-content
    :skill-name="selectedPage"
  ></main-content>
</template>

<script>
import mainContent from './mainContent.vue';
import skillBar from './skillBar.vue';
import { reactive } from 'vue';
export default {
  components: { skillBar, mainContent },
  data(){
    return {
      selectedPage:reactive('伐木'),
    }
  },
  provide(){
    return{
      skillName:this.selectedPage,
    }
  },
  methods: {
    getNewPage(newPage){
      this.selectedPage=newPage.name;
    }
  },
}
</script>

<style>
 html, body{
    display: flex;
    font-size: 16px;
    color: white;
    font:bolder;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    margin: 0;
    padding:0;
 }

 #app {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
 }



</style>
